title: Dream Team, The Match, NBA playoffs, Tua Tagovailoa
itunes:title: Dream Team, The Match, NBA playoffs, Tua Tagovailoa
description:
Colin explains why Michael Jordan not wanting Isiah Thomas on the Dream Team made sense, why the ratings of The Match proves golf needs to change, why he is for a possible playoff format change in the NBA, and why Tua Tagovailoa will most likely start this season. Guests include Ric Bucher, Danny Green, Rashad Jennings, and Jack McCallum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
